description.brazilian: Derrote o Guardião do Pesar Silencioso.
description.english: Defeat the Warden of Silent Sorrow.
description.french: Tuer le Gardien du Chagrin silencieux.
description.german: Besiegt den Wart der Stummen Trauer.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il Guardiano del Lamento silente.
description.japanese: 黙する悲哀の番人を倒す。
description.spanish: Vence al Guardián del Lamento Mudo.

description.brazilian: Derrote Ten Piedad.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Ten Piedad.
description.japanese: 慈悲を施す者を倒す。
description.spanish: Vence a Ten Piedad.

description.brazilian: Derrote a Nossa Senhora da Face Chamuscada.
description.english: Defeat Our Lady of the Charred Visage.
description.french: Vaincre Notre Dame au Visage calciné.
description.german: Besiegt Unsere Dame mit dem verbrannten Antlitz.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Nostra Signora dal Volto sfigurato.
description.japanese: 焦貌の聖女を倒す。
description.russian: Победите Владычицу нашу с ликом опаленным.
description.spanish: Vence a Nuestra Señora de la Faz Denegrida.

description.brazilian: Derrote as Tres Angustias.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Tres Angustias.
description.japanese: 三苦悶を倒す。
description.schinese: 击败特雷斯·安古斯塔斯
description.spanish: Vence a Tres Angustias.

description.brazilian: Derrote Esdras, da Legião Ungida.
description.english: Defeat Esdras of the Anointed Legion.
description.french: Vaincre Esdras, de la Légion ointe.
description.german: Besiegt Esdras von der Gesalbten Legion.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Esdras della Legione unta.
description.japanese: 聖別軍エズドラスを倒す。
description.koreana: 기름 부은 자들의 군단 에스드라스를 처치한다
description.spanish: Vence a Esdras, de la Legión Ungida.

description.brazilian: Derrote Melquíades, o Arcebispo Exumado.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Melquíades, l'Arcivescovo esumato.
description.japanese: 埋葬の大司教メルキアデスを倒す。
description.schinese: 击败梅尔基亚德斯，掘墓大主教
description.spanish: Vence a Melquíades, El Arzobispo Exhumado.

description.brazilian: Derrote Expósito, Herdeiro da Abjuração.
description.german: Besiegt Expósito, den Spross der Entsagung.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Expósito, Rampollo dell'Abiura.
description.japanese: 放棄の末裔エスポシトを倒す。
description.spanish: Vence a Expósito, Vástago de la Abjuración.

displayName.french: De la poussière à la poussière

description.brazilian: Derrote Quirce, Reenviado pelas Chamas.
description.english: Defeat Quirce, Returned by the Flames.
description.french: Vaincre Quirce, Ramené par les Flammes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Quirce, il Riemerso dalle Fiamme.
description.japanese: 炎による復活者キルセを倒す。
description.schinese: 击败永恒火葬的奎尔斯
description.spanish: Vence a Quirce, el Devuelto por las Llamas.

description.brazilian: Derrote Crisanta Envolta em Agonia.
description.english: Defeat Crisanta of the Wrapped Agony.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Crisanta dell'Agonia bendata.
description.japanese: 拘束の苦悶クリサンタを倒す。
description.russian: Победите Крисанту, дитя агонии в обмотках.
description.spanish: Vence a Crisanta de la Agonía Vendada.

displayName.japanese: スーマ・ブラスフェミア

description.brazilian: Derrote Sua Santidade Escribar.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Sua Santità Escribar.
description.japanese: 聖下エスクリバーを倒す。
description.spanish: Vence a Su Santidad Escribar.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o final A.
description.italian: Sblocca il finale A.
description.japanese: エンディングAを解放する。
description.spanish: Desbloquea el final A.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o final B.
description.italian: Sblocca il finale B.
description.japanese: エンディングBを解放する。
description.spanish: Desbloquea el final B.

description.brazilian: Liberte todos os querubins.
description.italian: Libera tutti i cherubini.
description.japanese: 智天使をすべて解放する。
description.spanish: Libera a todos los querubines.

description.brazilian: Descubra as últimas palavras dos 26 cadáveres originais.
description.english: Discover the last words of the 26 original corpses.
description.french: Découvrir les dernières paroles des 26 cadavres d'origine.
description.german: Entdeckt die letzten Worte der 26 urschriftlichen Leichen.
description.italian: Scopri le ultime parole dei 26 cadaveri originali.
description.japanese: 元から存在する死体26人すべてと会話する。
description.schinese: 发现26具原初死者的遗言
description.spanish: Descubre las últimas palabras de los 26 cadáveres del juego base.

displayName.japanese: デテスタシオ・サクロラム

description.brazilian: Complete todos os desafios de arena.
description.italian: Completa tutte le sfide dell'arena.
description.japanese: 試練をすべてクリアする。
description.spanish: Supera todos los desafíos de la arena.

description.brazilian: Consiga as 13 orações originais.
description.italian: Ottieni le 13 preghiere originali.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された祈詞13個をすべてゲットする。
description.spanish: Consigue los 13 rezos del juego base

description.brazilian: Consiga as 7 relíquias originais.
description.italian: Ottieni le 7 reliquie originali.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された聖遺物7個をすべてゲットする。
description.spanish: Consigue las 7 reliquias del juego base.

description.brazilian: Consiga as 30 contas de rosário originais.
description.french: Trouver les 30 perles de rosaire d'origine.
description.italian: Ottieni i 30 Grani del rosario originali.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された数珠玉30個をすべてゲットする。
description.spanish: Consigue las 30 cuentas de rosario del juego base.

description.brazilian: Consiga os 44 colecionáveis originais.
description.french: Trouver les 44 objets de collection d'origine.
description.italian: Ottieni i 44 collezionabili originali.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された収集物44個をすべてゲットする。
description.spanish: Consigue los 44 coleccionables del juego base.

description.brazilian: Consiga os 9 corações de espada originais.
description.italian: Ottieni i 9 Cuori di spada originali.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された剣の心臓9個をすべてゲットする。
description.spanish: Consigue los 9 corazones de la espada del juego base.

displayName.japanese: クヴストディアの巡礼者

description.brazilian: Descubra as principais áreas de Cvstodia.
description.english: Discover the main areas of Cvstodia.
description.french: Découvrir les zones principales de Cvstodia.
description.italian: Scopri le zone principali di Cvstodia.
description.japanese: クヴストディアのメインエリアを発見する。
description.schinese: 探索古斯托迪亚主要区域
description.spanish: Descubre las zonas principales de Cvstodia.

description.brazilian: Alcance o máximo de vida.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo di Salute.
description.japanese: 体力を最大値まで上昇させる。
description.spanish: Alcanza la capacidad máxima de salud.

description.brazilian: Alcance o máximo de fervor.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo di Fervore.
description.japanese: 熱情を最大値まで上昇させる。
description.spanish: Alcanza la capacidad máxima de fervor.

description.brazilian: Alcance o nível máximo da espada Mea Culpa.
description.english: Achieve the maximum level of the sword Mea Culpa.
description.french: Obtenir le niveau maximal pour l'épée Mea Culpa.
description.german: Erreicht die Maximalstufe des Schwertes Mea Culpa.
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo della spada Mea Culpa.
description.japanese: 懺悔の剣を最大レベルまで強化する。
description.russian: Улучшите меч Mea Culpa до максимального уровня.
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo de la espada Mea Culpa.

description.brazilian: Alcance a capacidade máxima de frascos.
description.french: Atteindre la capacité de flasque maximale.
description.italian: Raggiungi la capacità massima delle Boccette.
description.japanese: フラスコ瓶を最大数入手する。
description.spanish: Alcanza la capacidad máxima de matraces.

description.brazilian: Alcance o número máximo de espaços para contas de rosário.
description.english: Achieve the maximum number of rosary bead slots.
description.french: Obtenir le nombre maximal d'emplacements de perles de rosaire.
description.german: Erreicht die maximale Anzahl an Rosenkranzperlen.
description.italian: Raggiungi il numero massimo di slot per i Grani del rosario.
description.japanese: ロザリオのスロット数を最大値まで上昇させる。
description.koreana: 묵주 구슬 슬롯 수를 최대까지 올린다
description.schinese: 诵经念珠空槽达到最大值
description.spanish: Alcanza la capacidad máxima de huecos para cuentas de rosario.

description.brazilian: Execute 5 inimigos diferentes.
description.italian: Giustizia 5 nemici diversi.
description.japanese: 5種類の異なる敵を処刑する。
description.spanish: Ejecuta a 5 enemigos diferentes.

description.brazilian: Use o Contra-ataque Justo 5 vezes.
description.german: Setzt den Gerechten Konter 5 Mal ein.
description.italian: Usa Risposta proba 5 volte.
description.japanese: 天罰を5回成功させる。
description.spanish: Usa un Riposte Justo 5 veces.

description.brazilian: Visite a tumba da Nossa Senhora do Vestido Longo.
description.english: Visit the tomb of The Lady of the Tailed Gown.
description.french: Explorer la tombe de la Dame à la Robe traînante.
description.german: Besucht das Grab der Dame mit dem Schleppenkleid.
description.italian: Fai visita alla tomba della Signora del Flamenco.
description.japanese: 尾引く法服の淑女の墓を訪れる。
description.koreana: 꼬리 달린 가운의 여인이 잠든 무덤을 방문한다
description.russian: Посетите могилу Госпожи в хвостатом платье.
description.schinese: 访问长尾礼服女士之墓
description.spanish: Visita la tumba de la Señora de la Bata de Cola.

description.brazilian: Leve todas as oferendas a Lvdovico.
description.english: Bring all the offerings to Lvdovico.
description.french: Apporter toutes les offrandes à Lvdovico.
description.italian: Porta tutte le offerte a Lvdovico.
description.japanese: ルヴドヴィコに捧げものをすべて届ける。
description.schinese: 将所有供品带给罗德维罗
description.spanish: Lleva todas las ofrendas a Lvdovico.

description.brazilian: Presencie os momentos agonizantes de Viridiana.
description.english: Witness the dying moments of Viridiana.
description.german: Bezeugt die letzten Momente von Viridiana.
description.italian: Assisti agli ultimi momenti di Viridiana.
description.japanese: ヴィリディアナの最期を見届ける。
description.schinese: 目睹维尔达拉的最后时刻
description.spanish: Presencia los últimos momentos de Viridiana.

description.brazilian: Ajude Cleofas no caminho da redenção.
description.english: Help Cleofas on his path of redemption.
description.french: Accompagner Cleofas sur le chemin de sa rédemption.
description.german: Helft Cleofás auf seinem Pfad der Erlösung.
description.italian: Aiuta Cleofás lungo la via della sua redenzione.
description.japanese: クレファスの贖罪を手助けする。
description.russian: Помогите Клеофасу на его пути к искуплению.
description.schinese: 帮助克罗法斯完成他的救赎之旅
description.spanish: Ayuda a Cleofás en su redención.

displayName.japanese: ウルトレイア・エ・スゼイア

description.brazilian: Ajude o peregrino a alcançar seu final.
description.english: Help the pilgrim reach his destination.
description.french: Aider le pèlerin à atteindre sa destination.
description.german: Helft dem Pilger, sein Ziel zu erreichen.
description.italian: Aiuta il pellegrino a raggiungere la sua destinazione.
description.japanese: 巡礼者を助け、目的地へと辿り着かせる。
description.koreana: 순례자가 목적지에 도달할 수 있도록 돕는다
description.schinese: 帮助朝圣者抵达最终目的地
description.spanish: Ayuda al peregrino a llegar a su destino.

displayName.english: In the name of the High Wills
displayName.japanese: 天の意志の名において
displayName.spanish: En nombre de las Altas Voluntades

description.brazilian: Leve todas as oferendas ao Senhor das Margens Salgadas.
description.english: Bring all offerings to the Lord of the Salty Shores.
description.french: Apporter toutes les offrandes au Seigneur des Rives salées.
description.german: Bringt alle Opfergaben zum Herrn der Salzufer.
description.italian: Porta tutte le offerte al Signore delle Sponde salmastre.
description.japanese: 塩岸の祝福されし神に捧げものをすべて届ける。
description.koreana: 소금 해안의 축성자에게 모든 공물을 전해준다
description.russian: Принесите все подношения Повелителю Соленых берегов.
description.schinese: 将所有供品带给盐岸神佑领主
description.spanish: Lleva todas ofrendas al Señor de las Orillas Saladas.

description.brazilian: Salve todos os Beijadores de Chagas.
description.french: Sauver toutes les sœurs du Baiser des plaies.
description.italian: Salva tutti i Baciatori di piaghe.
description.japanese: 口付けの廉施者を全員救う。
description.spanish: Salva a todos los Besadores de Llagas.

description.brazilian: Compre todos os itens das lojas de Candelária.
description.english: Buy all the items in the Candelaria shops.
description.french: Acheter tous les objets des boutiques de la Candelaria.
description.german: Kauft alle Artikel in den Läden von Candelaria.
description.italian: Compra tutti gli oggetti nelle botteghe di Candelaria.
description.japanese: カンデラリアの商店ですべてのアイテムを買う。
description.koreana: 칸델라리아의 상점에 진열된 물건을 모두 구입한다
description.russian: Купите все предметы в лавке Канделярии.
description.schinese: 购买卡德拉尼亚商店中的所有物品
description.spanish: Compra todos los objetos en las tiendas de Candelaria.

description.brazilian: Choque o Ovo de Altasgracias.
description.german: Brütet das Ei von Altasgracias aus.
description.italian: Fai schiudere l'Uovo di Altasgracias.
description.japanese: アルタスグラシアスの卵を孵化させる。
description.schinese: 孵化阿塔吉拉卡斯之卵
description.spanish: Haz eclosionar el huevo de Altasgracias.

description.brazilian: Derrote Perpetva.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Perpetva.
description.japanese: ペルペチュアを倒す。
description.spanish: Vence a Perpetva.

description.brazilian: Derrote os 51 tipos originais de inimigos.
description.english: Defeat the 51 original types of enemies.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i 51 tipi originali di nemici.
description.japanese: 初期に実装された敵51種類をすべて倒す。
description.spanish: Vence a los 51 tipos de enemigos del juego base.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as habilidades nos altares de Mea Culpa.
description.english: Unlock all the abilities on the Mea Culpa altars.
description.french: Débloquer toutes les capacités sur les autels de Mea Culpa.
description.german: Schaltet alle Fähigkeiten der Mea-Culpa-Altäre frei.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le abilità sugli altari del Mea Culpa.
description.japanese: 懺悔の剣の祭壇ですべてのスキルを買う。
description.russian: Откройте все способности на алтарях Mea Culpa.
description.schinese: 自孽刃神龛购买所有技能
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las habilidades en los altares de Mea Culpa.

description.brazilian: Mate 666 inimigos.
description.italian: Uccidi 666 nemici.
description.japanese: 敵を666体殺す。
description.spanish: Mata a 666 enemigos.

description.brazilian: Provoque o encontro entre Redento e Cleofás.
description.english: Provoke the meeting between Redento and Cleofás.
description.french: Provoquer la rencontre entre Redento et Cleofás.
description.german: Provoziert das Treffen zwischen Redento und Cleofás.
description.italian: Provoca l'incontro fra Redento e Cleofás.
description.japanese: レデントとクレファスを邂逅させる。
description.schinese: 促进雷德罗与克罗法斯的会面
description.spanish: Provoca que Redento y Cleofás se encuentren.

displayName.japanese: レクイエム・エテルナム

description.brazilian: Derrote os chefes originais sem consumir frascos de bile.
description.english: Defeat the original bosses without consuming any bile flasks.
description.french: Vaincre les boss d'origine sans consommer de flasque de bile.
description.german: Besiegt die urschriftlichen Bosse, ohne Gallen-Flaschen einzusetzen.
description.italian: Sconfiggi i boss originali senza consumare Boccette biliari.
description.japanese: 初期に実装されたボスすべてをフラスコ瓶を使用せずに倒す。
description.koreana: 플라스크를 사용하지 않은 상태에서 기본 보스를 전부 처치한다
description.russian: Одолейте изначальных боссов, не использовав ни одной склянки с желчью.
description.schinese: 不用圣水瓶的情况下消灭原初的首领
description.spanish: Vence a los jefes del juego base sin consumir matraces biliares.

description.brazilian: Atravesse a porta de bronze na Ponte do Calvário em menos de 3 horas.
description.english: Pass through the bronze door on the Bridge of Calvary in less than 3 hours.
description.french: Franchir la porte de bronze sur le Pont du calvaire en moins de 3 heures.
description.german: Durchschreitet die Bronzetür auf der Brücke der Kalvarien in weniger als 3 Stunden.
description.italian: Supera la porta di bronzo sul Ponte del Calvario in meno di 3 ore.
description.japanese: 3時間以内に、三試練の橋にある銅の扉を突破する。
description.koreana: 갈보리의 다리에 위치한 청동 문을 3시간 내에 통과한다
description.russian: Пройдите Бронзовые врата на Мосту Страстей Господних меньше чем за 3 часа после начала игры.
description.schinese: 在3小时内穿越骷髅地桥上的铜门
description.spanish: Cruza la puerta de bronce en el Puente del Calvario en menos de 3 horas.

description.brazilian: Conclua 100% do jogo.
description.italian: Completa il gioco al 100%.
description.japanese: ゲームで100%を達成する。
description.spanish: Supera el 100 % del juego.
